backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining user profiles, vehicles, notifications, access control, storage mixins, and invite link APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing affected files, components, and test IDs for rebuild, redeploy, and startup retry-flow verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing various frontend files, components, hooks, and pages used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer with light/dark theme color variables and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA manifest, icons, metadata, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, categories, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching strategy with network-first HTML handling and selective asset caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and app shell defining routes, layout, authentication gating, and bootstrap error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied page and allows eligible users to claim first admin access by submitting profile data.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileBoot: Shows detailed profile-loading errors, classifies the failure type, and offers retry and error-copy options.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignInScree: Renders an Internet Identity sign‑in screen with branding and security benefit explanations.
frontend/src/components/auth/StartupBoot: Displays startup initialization errors with guidance and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/brand/AppLogo.ts: Renders the application logo in multiple size options.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout with conditional header/footer based on authentication and route.
frontend/src/components/lost/MarkLostDia: Dialog for reporting a vehicle as lost, requiring a note and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/lost/ReportFound: Dialog for reporting a found vehicle, collecting a finder report and submitting it.
frontend/src/components/nav/AppHeader.ts: Navigation header with user menu, admin-aware links, and logout handling using identity and profile hooks.
frontend/src/components/system/TopLevelE: Error boundary that catches top-level render failures and displays a fallback UI.
Fallback screen showing an error message and reload option when the app crashes.
frontend/src/components/transfer/Initiat: Panel to start a vehicle transfer, prompting for PIN and generating a transfer code and shareable link.
frontend/src/components/transfer/PinProm: Dialog that collects a PIN, handles submission state, and displays errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorBootstrapStat: Hook exposing actor initialization status with retry logic and query reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Admin-related hooks for checking admin status, onboarding, system stats, invite codes, and registered vehicles.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLostVehicles.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching lost vehicles and marking vehicles as lost or found via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Adds hooks to retrieve user notifications with polling and to mark notifications as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Implements a mutation hook to complete user onboarding and refresh the current user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/usePin.ts: Exposes mutations for setting up and updating a user's PIN through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfile.ts: Provides hooks to load and save the caller's user profile, keyed by Internet Identity principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: Adds hooks for initiating and accepting vehicle transfers and invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useVehicles.ts: Includes hooks for fetching user vehicles, fetching a single vehicle, and registering new vehicles with cache updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Displays application information, features, and admin contact details with styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AcceptTransferPage.ts: Form page for accepting a vehicle transfer using a transfer code, handling validation and success navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing system statistics and navigation to admin management sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInviteToke: Admin page for viewing, generating, and copying invite tokens with usage indicators.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user stats (vehicles, lost vehicles, notifications) and provides quick navigation actions on the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LostVehiclesPage.tsx: Shows a searchable list of reported lost vehicles with details, images, and a dialog for reporting found vehicles.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists user notifications, allows marking them as read, and handles loading and empty states.
Handles user onboarding via invite token and profile form submission, then completes account setup.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits user profile information with save and logout functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterVehiclePage.t: Provides a form to register a new vehicle, including photo upload with progress tracking.
Page for creating and updating a user's PIN with validation and success/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/VehicleDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a selected vehicle, including status, photo, metadata, and owner actions.
frontend/src/pages/VehiclesPage.tsx: Lists the user's registered vehicles with status badges and navigation to registration or detail pages.
frontend/src/utils/actorProxy.ts: Creates a safe proxy around the backend actor to gracefully handle admin access initialization failures.
frontend/src/utils/actorQueryKey.ts: Utility for generating consistent React Query keys for actor-related queries.
frontend/src/utils/bootstrapError.ts: Provides helpers to extract, classify, and format bootstrap errors, including detection of canister-stopped, network, auth, and unknown issues.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them for routing and state management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including summary, architecture notes, known issues, and feature tracking metadata.
